entry.title: Lena Henningsen to Present ChinaComx at the CATS-Forum 2024

link.title: Lena Henningsen to Present ChinaComx at the CATS-Forum 2024

entry.content:
To give a first overview of the ChinaComx project outline, its goals, and research ideas, our PI, Lena Henningsen, will give a presentation at the CATS-Forum held tomorrow, on Friday 26 January 2024, between 11 am (c.t.) – ca. 2 pm, in room 400.02.12 in the Karl Jaspers Centre.

We are happy to see old and new friends and collegues!

entry.title: ERC-ChinaComx Begins Its Journey Into the World of Chinese Comics

link.title: ERC-ChinaComx Begins Its Journey Into the World of Chinese Comics

entry.content:
Welcome to this new research project titled “ChinaComx: Comics Culture in the People’s Republic of China”!

  • To learn more about the project, see: About. You can also visit our page at the website of the Institute of Chinese Studies at Heidelberg University here.
  • We are hiring! See Apply for Call for Applications and come do research with us!
  • The team members introduce themselves here: Team
  • And if you want to get in touch with us — please do! — see contact for details.

This is just a starting webspace for the ChinaComx project in its initial phase; we are working on a more advanced website to be to be launched in September 2024.
